review: Extremely frustrating item.  Had to reset and reinstall nearly ever time I wanted to watch something from my iPhone or iPad.  Would not recommend this item.

review: Good. But still can be better. .

review: Does what it says, and easy to set up.

review: cheap and easy way to download movies to laptop and iPhone and watch them on tv.

review: My kids love this device!!! What a great way to use Netflix and Hulu!

review: Works as described. Very nice product.
author: Jose

review: Got this a a gift for my son.He has WiFi but really didn't want to get cable for video as not home enough to warrant the cost.  For the price, I was wondering if it actually worked as described. My kid said it works great, picture quality exceptional! Took two minutes to set up and voila, he hsd TV back  with online services, has plenty to watch.
author: Ricky Knapton

review: It's OK. When it works it works well, but often the device does not get recognized and I cannot play it on tv. It is also unfortunate that you can only use it on youtube and not much else.
author: RdL
